content:
I think the que-7 invariant expression should be operator = 'exists' implies (answer is boolean) instead of operator = 'exists' implies (answer is Boolean) (different capitalization on the boolean type) because FHIRPath is case sensitive.

links:

  • https://www.hl7.org/fhir/questionnaire.html#invs
  • http://hl7.org/fhirpath/2018Sep/index.html#case-sensitivity
@Gabriela Brown Can you submit a change request?
